ca.ualberta.cs.phebert.litx

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.phebert.litx.Request

  • public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Request object for a book, contains the book, book owner and user that is requesting the book
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    phebert
    See Also:
    BookStatusActivity, BookViewActivity, ExchangeActivity

      • scan

        @OwnerCalled
public static void scan(android.content.Context ctx)
        Look requests up on firebase, and get all pertaining If any requests are not on disk, Create a notification. This should be called by a daemon/service. FIXME: may be replaced by firebase push notifications.
        Parameters:
        ctx -

      • push

        @OwnerCalled
public static void push()
        Push the given requests to firebase. If any are resolved or refused, delete them from firebase.
